nodes.text: Tofen's Raiders were a unit of ace pilots from the planet Valahari that served the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. Flying their elite Tempest Zero starfighters, the Raiders flew countless sorties across the northern Separatist territories.

Tofen's Raiders were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. They were originally created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, where they first appeared in The Clone Wars 10, a 2009 comic book written by Henry Gilroy and Steven Melching, with illustrations by Brian Koschak.
